summary: Two immature detectives are joined by a pesky assistant district attorney in staking out a lakeside home where a Mafia trial witness is believed to be heading.
cast: Richard Dreyfuss|Emilio Estevez|Rosie O'Donnell|Dennis Farina|Marcia Strassman|Cathy Moriarty|John Rubinstein|Miguel Ferrer|Sharon Maughan|Christopher Doyle|Sharon Schaffer|Rick Seaman|Jan Speck|Gene Ellison-Jones|Frank DeAngelo|J.R. West|Frank C. Turner|Steven Lambert|Dan Lauria|Denalda Williams|Larry B. Scott|Christi Brasher|Sammy Jackson|Blu Mankuma|Thomas Mitchell|Scott Andersen|Michael DeLano|Al Goto|Steve Bacic|Taylor Estevez|Bruce Paul Barbour|Richard L. Blackwell|Michael Steve Jones|Chris Shoemaker|Nancy Sosna|Cammie Crier|Martin Rogers|John Badham|Madeleine Stowe
title: En el punto de mira
